song.title: Inside a Game
song.info:
All sound goes from Atari Falcon 030 (stock version). It's a 10-channels song made on DHS-Tracker (Digital Home Studio).
Computers used: Atari Falcon 030 (main work and everything - almost ;) ), Atari 520ST (for samples), ZX Spectrum 48K with AY-interface (for samples).
Synthesizers used for samples: Yamaha E423
Software: Main editor - on Falcon - DHS-Tracker (Digital Home Studio) MusicMon V2.5e on Atari 520ST (samples-making) SoundTracker 1.1 on ZX Spectrum 48K (samples-making).
This is my third Falcon song. It took the first place on digital music contest of SillyVenture 2012 party.
